metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0486 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Knot DNS before 1.5.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted DNS message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0486` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

knot - 1.5.2-1
knot-dnsutils - 1.5.2-1
knot-host - 1.5.2-1
libdnssec0 - 1.5.2-1
libknot1 - 1.5.2-1
libzscanner0 - 1.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: knot package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-1').
